tool_description:
Ethereum Price Index supplied by BitcoinAverage

The GEX data accessed via the BitcoinAverage API features:

Up to 1 second refresh rate
Rates for 165+ currencies
Daily rates at preferred lock in time or live rates
Historic daily rates dating back to 2010
JSON or CSV formats

-------

About BitcoinAverage

BitcoinAverage.com is proud of the fact that we were the first global price index in the cryptocurrency and blockchain industry, and have proven over the years to also be one of the most reliable. It is considered by most as the de facto standard bitcoin price index.

It is trusted by thousands of users across hundreds the world’s leading websites, apps, services and businesses. With our historical bitcoin price data stretching back to 2010, this index is perfect for a multitude of uses from reporting, invoicing, payment processing, analysis and accounting, as well as a plethora of integrations with different types of software.

Users receive a weighted price calculated by our algorithms that factor in exchange activity, liquidity and different fee methodologies.
name: Global Ethereum Price Index - GEX
title: Global Ethereum Price Index - GEX

api_list.name: Custom Ticker
api_list.description: This endpoint can be used to generate a custom index in a certain currency. The “inex” path parameter represents “include” or “exclude”, you can choose to generate an index removing specified exchanges, or only including the few that you require.

required_parameters.name: inex
required_parameters.description: include - if you want the ticker to be calculated using only the exchanges sent as query parameter; exclude - if you want the price to be calculated using all exchanges, but the ones sent as query parameter.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: ETH<fiat> where <fiat> is valid ISO currency (ex. ETHUSD)

api_list.name: Ticker Per Symbol
api_list.description: Returns ticker data for specified symbol

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: ETH<fiat>, where <fiat> is valid ISO currency (ex. ETHUSD, ETHEUR)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoinaverage-global-ethereum-index-v1.p.rapidapi.com/indices/global/ticker/ETHUSD"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoinaverage-global-ethereum-index-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoinaverage-global-ethereum-index-v1.p.rapidapi.com/indices/{market}/ticker/{symbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoinaverage-global-ethereum-index-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Short Ticker
api_list.description: Returns basic ticker denoting last and daily average price for all symbols

optional_parameters.name: fiats
optional_parameters.description: If fiats parameter is included then only the values for those fiats will be returned (ETHUSD and ETHEUR in this example). If it's missing, then the response will contain ticker values of all available fiats for ETH.

api_list.name: Ticker Changes
api_list.description: Returns ticker values and price changes for specified market and symbol.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Possible values: ETH<fiat> where <fiat> is valid ISO currency (ex. ETHUSD)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoinaverage-global-ethereum-index-v1.p.rapidapi.com/indices/local/ticker/ETHUSD/changes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoinaverage-global-ethereum-index-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoinaverage-global-ethereum-index-v1.p.rapidapi.com/indices/{market}/ticker/{symbol}/changes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoinaverage-global-ethereum-index-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All Ticker Data
api_list.description: If no query parameters are sent, then returns ticker data for every supported symbol. If fiat(s) are sent as parameters, then only the ticker for those values is sent.

optional_parameters.name: fiat
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated list of ISO currency codes (ex. USD,EUR)
